subject: Soccer
Hurricane Katrina (2005)
lead_paragraph: A group of expats living in New Orleans had just started a pub soccer team when the monster storm struck in 2005. But they’ve rebuilt their homes, their pub and their team.
snippet: A group of expats living in New Orleans had just started a pub soccer team when the monster storm struck in 2005. But they’ve rebuilt their homes, their pub and their team.
